players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Bob: "Be careful, Charlie might be the mafioso."
Charlie: "Charlie, I see you. Stay cautious."
Bob: "I will continue to investigate and gather more evidence. Stay vigilant, as the mafioso could be among us."
You: "I will keep an open mind and gather more information. Let's work together to uncover the truth."
Charlie: "Be wary of Bob's deductions. He might be onto something, but don't jump to conclusions just yet."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: remained silent.
You: "Be careful, Charlie might be the mafioso."
Charlie: "Charlie, I see you. Stay cautious."
You: "I will continue to investigate and gather more evidence. Stay vigilant, as the mafioso could be among us."
Alice: "I will keep an open mind and gather more information. Let's work together to uncover the truth."
Charlie: "Be wary of Bob's deductions. He might be onto something, but don't jump to conclusions just yet."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: remained silent.
Bob: "Be careful, Charlie might be the mafioso."
You: "Charlie, I see you. Stay cautious."
Bob: "I will continue to investigate and gather more evidence. Stay vigilant, as the mafioso could be among us."
Alice: "I will keep an open mind and gather more information. Let's work together to uncover the truth."
You: "Be wary of Bob's deductions. He might be onto something, but don't jump to conclusions just yet."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
